title: Is it just me, or did the TFT pass just end, and cut out the last rewards?
body:
Yesterday, looked at the pass, still had an emote and the free little legends to go.

Today, claimed the emote.  Immediately afterwards the XP bar maxed out, and the free little legends at the end of the pass are gone _(the arrow to go forward is greyed out)_.  Missions are still up. 

Did I just happen to get enough points for the emote a split second before the pass ended.  _(I was not aware of any Riot posts signalling its impending end?)_ Or is something else happening here?  And why can't I scroll forward to see the prizes that haven't been claimed yet?

Anyone wiser than I, please let me know what's happening.
I'm less worried about the prizes themselves (the maps were what I was after), but I'm more concerned about why they were suddenly cut out. without _(to my eyes)_ any warning.

replies.body:
I'll pass this one on though it's already been posted a lot on NA. It's either yet another client bug to add to the long list of preseason drama, or there's been a lack of communication regarding the pass.

I'm leaning towards bug, simply because they said: "This one will stay up for the entire length of the Rise of the Elements set." and we haven't heard anything about the next set yet.

Ahh ok thanks!

Yeah maybe itâ€™s a bug then.  
Preseason is always drama haha
